channel.title: Commercial Real Estate on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Commercial Real Estate on FinanClub

item.title: O
item.description: score:-74 Chances: Wealthy investors allocate a meaningful percentage of their portfolio to real estate. If you’re looking for income-paying stocks, these two have proven dividend growth track records and strong businesses. Real estate investment trusts are an easier path to producing passive income.

item.title: VLY
item.description: score:-167 Chances: Valley National Bancorp has reported an increase in revenue of 1.7% from FY2022 to FY2023. The company has announced a new share repurchase program, indicating confidence in its long-term sustainability. Valley National Bancorp has declared regular preferred and common dividends, demonstrating financial stability and shareholder value.
